_pdinfo Struct Reference

Packet device information. More...

#include <nimu_icssInternal.h>

Data Fields

unsigned int PhysIdx
 Physical index of this device (0 to n-1).
 
HANDLE hEther
 Handle to logical driver.
 
STKEVENT_Handle hEvent
 Semaphore handle used by NDK stack and driver to communicate any pending Rx events that need to be serviced by NDK ethernet stack.
 
uint8_t bMacAddr [6]
 MAC Address.
 
unsigned int Filter
 Current RX filter.
 
uint32_t OldMCastCnt
 Previous MCast Address Counter.
 
uint8_t bOldMCast [6 *PKT_MAX_MCAST]
 Previous Multicast list configured by the Application.
 
unsigned int MCastCnt
 Current MCast Address Countr.
 
uint8_t bMCast [6 *PKT_MAX_MCAST]
 Multicast list configured by the Application.
 
unsigned int TxFree
 Transmitter "free" flag.
 
PBMQ PBMQ_tx
 Tx queue (one for each PKT device)
 
PBMQ PBMQ_rx
 Rx queue (one for each PKT device)
 

Detailed Description

Packet device information.

This structure caches the device info.
